resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In:

3rd PARTY REFERENCES:
(Scroll Down till bottom) 

1. API and SDK REFERENCES: 

This App has used multiple open-source APIs and SDKs for Android.

The APIs and SDKs used, are all publicly accessible and available, for an indefinite time period, without any cost or charge. 

The APIs used are listed below: 
1. Google Maps API and Places SDK 
2. Braintree PayPal SDK 
3. Firebase SDK 
4. Glide Image Loading API (bumptech.github.io/glide/) 

The URLs to the License Requirements for each of the above APIs and SDKs are listed below, in their respective order: 

1. https://developers.google.com/maps/terms#9-license-requirements 
2. (MIT License) https://github.com/braintree/braintree_android/blob/master/LICENSE 
3. (Apache 2.0 License) https://github.com/firebase/quickstart-android/blob/master/LICENSE 
4. (MIT and Apache 2.0 License) https://github.com/bumptech/glide/blob/master/LICENSE 

2. IMAGE REFERENCES: 

The URLs of the images used are listed below: 

1. App logo: https://logopond.com/logos/211d9c927ce358e20581c624b74aaae1.png 
2. Home Page logo: https://myonlinesecurity.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/express_delivery.jpg 
3. Braintree PayPal Icon: http://fintechnews.sg/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/braintreepayments-1440x564_c.png 
4. All the other smaller icons have been taken from the Materials Design wesbite https://material.io/tools/icons
